nodes.text: Sparky was an huge exoboar owned by the Ravagers, a pirate gang based on Rishi. Sparky had a large litter of young exoboars—Dinner, Duke, Grappa, Jwizzix'Xthor, Nerf, North, Precious, Scrapp, Tank, The Boss, Voguz, Deshy Little Pirate, Spike, Mu Na Ya, and Tenebro—that guarded the gate to Coratanni Town. In 3637 BBY, the independent operatives hired by Ruugar, the former leader of the Ravagers, to take out his traitorous Coratanni, and Sparky was slain by the operatives along with her litter.
